notes: Flames receive Florida's 2025 1st-round pick only if: (a) Florida's 2024 1st is not top-10 and conveys to Philadelphia in the Claude Giroux trade, AND (b) Florida's 2025 1st is not top-10. If Calgary receives the 1st-rounder, Calgary's 2025 4th-round pick goes to Florida.
Vancouver received Marco Rossi, Liam Ohgren, Zeev Buium, and a 2026 1st-round pick.
2026 and 2028 1st-round picks are top-10 protected. 2026 converts to unprotected 2027 1st if not conveyed; 2028 converts to unprotected 2029 1st if not conveyed.
2025 1st-round pick top-13 protected. If protected, Vancouver receives an unprotected 2026 1st-round pick (sent to Pittsburgh).
Chicago retains 26% salary. If Florida lacks its 2026 1st, the pick conveys in 2027. Florida acquires a 2026 4th. Chicago acquires Spencer Knight and a conditional 2026 1st.
One-for-one trade: Mitch Marner for Nicolas Roy.
Boston retains 50% of contract. Conditional 2nd becomes 2027 or 2028 1st if Florida wins two rounds and Marchand plays at least 50% of playoff games.
2023 1st top-2 protected (unprotected 2024). Conditional: 2024 1st if NJD reaches 2023 ECF and Meier plays 50% (top-10 protected at NJD option), else 2024 2nd.
2023 1st top-12 protected. If protected, Vancouver receives NYI 2024 1st instead.
Red Wings option of Bruins or Red Wings 2024 1st. If Bruins pick is top-10, Bruins may instead send 2025 1st; Detroit chooses between Bruins or Red Wings pick.
2023 1st is lower of DAL and NYR picks. 2024 4th becomes 3rd if NYR makes playoffs. St. Louis retains 50% salary.
2023 1st top-5 protected (unprotected 2024). Conditional 2nd becomes 2024 1st (top-10 protected) if OTT reaches 2023 ECF; otherwise unprotected 2025.
If 2026 1st is transferred to PHI or top-10, COL sends 2027 1st instead. 2028 3rd conditional on COL Cup win + Nelson 50% playoff games. NYI retains 50% salary.
Three-team trade. DET retains 25% of Gourde; SEA retains 50%. 2025 2nd-round pick is Toronto's.
2024 1st if CAR reaches SCF, else 2nd. Conditional 2024 5th if CAR wins Cup.
If 2023 1st is top-10, TBL sends unprotected 2025 1st. If both 2023 and 2024 picks are top-10, TBL sends unprotected 2025 and 2026 1sts.
